about_the_game:
A pure, minimal arcade game about risk, reward, and rollercoasters. Hurtle down the track at breakneck speeds in search of the perfect line. Earn mutations which change the game in surprising ways, and mix and match them to create your own unique challenges. Sequel to the award-winning classic.

SURVIVE


Guide THE VESSEL down the track at speed, scoring for each gate you make it through. Navigate hair-pin bends, jumps, banked curves and adverse camber - whatever the road throws at you.

And with no two tracks the same, you won't know what's coming next.

LEAP


If you see a shortcut, take it. Nobody will notice if you don’t hit every single checkpoint. Take daring leaps from apex to apex to find the best shortcuts, cutting huge parts of the track.

MUTATE

Earn mutations through play and remix them to create your own hyperversion of the game.

Perhaps every time you go through a checkpoint the camera twists 90 degrees?


Or perhaps the player is bigger than the track, and gravity is moon-like?


Mix and match mutations to make your own challenges and aesthetics. Demonstrate your creativity and ability to play the game with crazy mutations in live streams.

COMPETE

Every possible combination of gameplay affecting mutations has its own leaderboard. Want to be the best at upside-down, low gravity, giant ball, burning track Impossible Road? You can be - as long as you actually are.

MORE

More to come! New gameplay systems and details will be revealed shortly. As well as wishlisting, hit the FOLLOW button up above to get these details, as well as first access to the demo.

FEATURES

  • Daily Challenge mode gives you a new challenge on a fresh leaderboard every day
  • Minimal techno soundtrack by Death to Computer
  • Support for ultra wide aspect ratios and high frame rates

  • OS *: Windows 8 or later

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
